section.title: Introduction
section.para: This is a project that aims to provide some wrapper classes for algebraic mathematical concepts.At the moment it includes the Monomial and Polynomial classes for general calculus. The library is currently in expansion.Any feedback is much appreciated!

section.title: Installation
section.para: The project comes with a folder with some bash files that complete some Meson related tasks.All bash files must be executed from the project's root directory to work properly.To install the project, there is only need to execute two of them files.Once installed just include the emath.h header file in your code and link it with its implementation.

section.title: Step one: Setup the Project
section.para: To setup the Meson project run the setup.sh bash file: bash ./scripts/setup.sh
